pullRequest.title: Fix #6420: ScheduleRenderer encodeEnd cleanup
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixed Line Ending from DatePicker commit.
@tandraschko I only check for LazyModel and isRequestSource without the event name as it seems multiple events can trigger this redraw in Schedule?

When I look at the Form Data for Lazy schedule when pressing say the Previous or Next Day buttons.
javax.faces.partial.ajax: true

j_idt729:j_idt731_end: 2020-12-13T05:00:00.000Z

j_idt729:j_idt731_view: dayGridMonth
javax.faces.ViewState: -6890984407278275305:9217892359940988958

There is no javax.faces.behavior.event for many of these Schedule calls.

nodes.bodyText: This is the real fix the other two files are just EOL fixes.
